bow: so sick of the small girlie selection of play kitchens and inspired by dad of reddit decided to try turning and old kitchen into science lab needless to say have very happy yo this is fantastic again hope this helps guys good luck with this project really enjoyed it and could be happier with the end result definitely worth the time love it our families bought our daughter bunch of girly crap and ca wait to make her something like this kudos on getting your child excited about science good luck its awesome and got ta admit he makes it pretty easy hes very curious kid and loves doing only but very advanced know every mom says that so hope she is curious too have you read the askreddit thread with cool experiments to do with your kids it ll be fantastic with this lab this is very
